content:
It sounds like Luna is a bundle of joy and energy! Her playful and affectionate personality is sure to bring lots of happiness and laughter to your life.

It's completely normal for kittens to be mischievous and get into trouble sometimes - it's all part of their natural curiosity and exploration phase. And who can resist that cute little face, right?

Climbing and jumping are great ways for Luna to exercise and develop her motor skills, so make sure to provide her with plenty of opportunities to do so. You might consider setting up a kitten agility course or providing her with cat towers and shelves to climb.

It's also wonderful that she's very affectionate and loves to cuddle. This is a great sign of a strong bond between you two, and it's something to cherish and nurture as she grows.

How's Luna's vocalization? Does she meow, purr, or make other sounds to communicate with you?
